roleset.name: holding back

roles.note: Differences from verbal frame: Arg3-instrument omitted. Use MNR.

example.name: args 0 and 2
example.text: It is easy to understand his restraint from doing drugs

example.name: all args
example.text: ...because of his mother's restraint of him from shedding blood...

example.name: the limit arg1 is restrained to- GOL
example.text: However, for its transversal and temporal character as well as its restraint to Brazilian hotels with more than 40 rooms in a specific city, it is not possible to generalize all hotel universes
example.arg: to Brazillian hotels with more than 40 rooms in a specific city
example.note: Compare "He restrained himself from eating all the food" to "He restrained himself to only 3 meals a day". This example is akin to the second case, where the limit is being mentioned, rather than the action restrained.
